Attribute.AttributeName: Gendarme.Framework.Solution("Remove the (unsecured) visible fields, turn them into (secured) properties or reduce their visibility.")
Gendarme.Framework.Problem("This type is secured by [Link]Demand but expose some visible fields.")

Docs.summary: The rule checks for types that are secured by Demand or LinkDemand but also expose visible fields. Access to these fields is not covered by the declarative demands, opening potential security holes.
Docs.remarks: Before Gendarme 2.2 this rule was part of Gendarme.Rules.Security and named TypeExposeFieldsRule.
